GenAiFunction.description:
Retrieve metadata about objects, fields and relationships in the org.
USAGE GUIDELINES: - Two operation modes: allObjects or objectDetails - allObjects: Lists custom objects only, sorted alphabetically - objectDetails: Returns field details for specified objects including: * Field API Name * Data Type * Reference Objects (for lookup/master-detail) * Relationship Name - Field output format: FieldName\tType\tReferences\tRelationshipName - Performance scales with number of objects requested - Case-insensitive object name matching - Handles both standard and custom objects - Validates object existence before processing - Maximum recommended objects per request: 10 - Returns empty response for inaccessible objects
